quote: It was really nice working with Imad. His communication skills are very nice. Explains everything very well. Does clean code and goes for best practices. I am very happy wow. I wanted something new and he was excited so much that he learned this in no time, so he can learn very fast if needed. For the rest he has so much experience. I would definitely recommend him.
author: Jonas Van Hastel

quote: This guy is amazing!! Always goes above and beyond and does his best to execute any given assignment!
author: Dylan Locus

quote: I had the pleasure of working with Imad, who single-handedly handled the backend of multiple applications with remarkable efficiency and expertise. His strong command over Node.js and NestJS consistently delivered clean, scalable solutions.
author: Hassan Ahmad
